data.question: What is the space group of Zn(CN)2 at 0.14 GPa?
At what temperature does Cd(im)2 start to decompose?
Is the compressibility of Zn(CN)2 in the high pressure phase positive?
What method was used to determine the variable-temperature lattice parameters for Cd(im)2?
Does the cadmium–imidazolate centroid distance increase with temperature in Cd(im)2?
What is the main displacement pattern responsible for NTE in Zn(CN)2?
data.answer: Concerted tilts of columns of [Zn(C/N)4] tetrahedra

data.question: At what pressure does Zn(CN)2 undergo a phase transition from cubic to orthorhombic?
Is the crystal structure of Cd(im)2 more symmetric at higher temperatures?
What is the effect of temperature on the Cd–Cd distances in Cd(im)2?
data.answer: The Cd–Cd distances increase as a function of temperature

data.question: Do the zinc displacements in Zn(CN)2 obey 'ice rules'?
What is the compressibility of Zn(CN)2-II along the a-axis at 12.2 GPa?
What is the Ueq value for Cd1 in Cd(im)2 at 100 K?
Does the volume of Zn(CN)2 increase or decrease under pressure?
Is the thermal expansion behavior of Cd(im)2 anisotropic?
What is the role of temperature in the structural behavior of Cd(im)2?
data.answer: Temperature increases the symmetry of the structure

data.question: What is the space group of Cd(im)2 at 500 K?
Does the cadmium–imidazolate centroid distance in Cd(im)2 decrease linearly with temperature?
What is the main driving force behind the phase transition in Zn(CN)2?
What is the effect of temperature on the metric symmetry of Cd(im)2?
Do the displacements in Zn(CN)2 lead to an increase in coordination number at high pressures?
